summary: Crisp, clean ENB preset for Vivid Weathers intended for regular gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81368-0-1511215982.png[/img][/center]


[quote]
[center]Big thanks to [b]CommanderBrightside[/b] and [b]Aiyeen[/b] for permission to use their files![b]
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61968/?]Elder Blood[/url]'s weathers were originally used as a base, and the shaders are from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48730/?]Skylight[/url].

Also big thanks to CyborgArmGun for helping me track down pitch black nights o' doom.[/center][/quote]

My personal preset with clean colours and  light fantasy feel through heavy use of custom weathers.


[size=4]IT'S GOT ...[/size]
[b]Light bloom:[/b] crisp distant views with no washed out haze
[b]Performance:[/b] intended for regular gameplay
[b]Atmosphere:[/b] sunny days are bright and cheery, storms more moody
[b]DLC support:[/b] Dawnguard/Dragonborn weathers and specialty weathers (Sovngarde, Blackreach etc.) are covered


[size=4]it's not ...[/size]
[list]
[*]realistic
[*]flashy
[*]a hazy bloom soup
[*]guaranteed to be your cup of tea
[/list]

[size=4]REQUIRED[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]Vivid Weathers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609/?]Relighting Skyrim[/url]**
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url] (ELE)**

** You won't crash without these but using other lighting mods won't look as intended.


[size=4]INSTALLATION[/size]
1. Download the latest binaries from [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0319.htm]enbdev.com[/url] (black arrow in bottom left corner)
2. Copy & Paste [u]only[/u] [color=#93c47d][b]d3d9.dll[/b][/color] and [color=#93c47d][b]enbhost[/b] [/color]from the WRAPPER folder into your main Skyrim folder
3. Edit your [b]skyrimprefs.ini [/b]with the changes below:

[Display]
------------------------------------
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bDrawShadows=1
fGamma=1.0000

[color=#ff0000]MOD ORGANIZER USERS[/color] need to make the above edits though MO instead!

4. Turn off hardware anti-aliasing & anisotropic filtering.

5. Set up your enblocal.ini memory values according to [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENBlocal_INI/Memory]this guide[/url].




[b][size=4]COMPATIBLE[/size][/b]
nighteye effects


[size=4]INCOMPATIBLE[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]RLO[/url]
Mods that remove/alter fog, such as: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Remove Exterior Fog[/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?]Remove Interior Fog[/url] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
Other weather mods


[size=4]RECOMMENDED / IN SCREENSHOTS:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78745/?]Y.A.L.O.[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68782/?]Enhanced Landscapes
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81312/?]Dark Forests of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url] or WATER
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721/?]DynDOLOD[/url]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/81368-0-1511218751.png[/img][/center]
author: Rusey
